body: At 6th level, as a swift action, you can change the location of one of your blast runes. The rune must be within 30 feet. You can place the blast rune in any square adjacent to you, including one occupied by another creature.
name: Rune Shift
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Cleric/Subdomains/Language Subdomain/Replacement Power/Rune Shift
